menu_dialog_become_infamous_prestige:
You will become Infamous.

No offshore money is required.

You will gain one Infamy rank. If you are at Infamy rank 100 or below, you will also receive an Infamy Reward.
BetterInfamy__dialog_cs_claim_rewards_te:
If the experience gained is enough to increase your Infamy rank by 2 or more, the promotion to the desired rank will happen automatically.

No money or offshore funds are required for Infamy promotions.
BetterInfamy__popup_text: Your Infamy rank has been increased to:
